page.title: 11MY LIFE IN LANGLEY-DANIEL
page.content: A day in the life of Daniel. I wake up at 7.00am. I get up and put my radio on and then get dressed and go and let the dog in. I have my breakfast,usually Weetabix,and at 7.30 I go over to the pub "The Farmer's Boy" in Langley to do my Saturday job. I do odd jobs like filling up the shelves,taking out empty bottles and sweeping the floor.I finish about 10.00am and get paid Â£4.Then I go home and Mum takes me dry skiing in the afternoon at Stanborough Park, Welwyn Garden City.That's good fun.When we get home we have lunch.My favourite is chips. Sometimes I play on my bike in the afternoon or I might take my dog out for a walk. She is a red setter called Corrie.In the evening I watch TV and at about 9.00pm I go to bed.
